# The stone furnace is now working, with 4 units of coal as fuel and 9 units of iron ore remaining to be processed. 
# The furnace is actively smelting the iron ore into iron plates. 

# Let's wait for the smelting process to complete and check the results. We can monitor the furnace status to see when it has finished processing the iron ore.

# We will periodically check the furnace status to see if it has produced any iron plates.
while True:
    if furnace.furnace_result:  # Check if there are any results from the furnace.
        break  # Exit the loop if smelting is complete.
    time.sleep(1)  # Wait for a second before checking again.

# After smelting, let's check the inventory to see the results.
print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities to see the furnace status.
